name: DopplerCraft
description:
作品简介

你见过加入多普勒效应的飞行射击游戏吗？我相信没有。

我们（BrotherShort & HUAHUA）在 Global Game Jam 2017 上想到了这个创意，并完成了原型。之后经过调试打磨重制，我们将《DopplerCraft》打造成了一款完整的游戏。

一艘小小的飞船航行在宇宙中，突然，敌人成群结队扑面而来！

你需要控制飞船灵活地绕过密集的敌人生存下来，然后打败BOSS赢得胜利。

游戏有6个关卡，不同的敌人形态各异，各具特色，难度不小，顺利通关并不容易。要想在游戏中获得胜利，你需要拥有敏锐的色感，灵活的操作，和协调能力。

话不多说，赶快来玩吧。

Introduction

Have you ever seen a STG with the Doppler Effect? I believe no.

We two ( BrotherShort & HUAHUA ) came up with the idea on Global Game Jam 2017 and finished the demo. After debugging and reconstruction, we made DopplerCraft into a complete short game.

A small spaceship sails in the space, all of a sudden, the enemies fly in droves!

You need to control the spaceship to flexibly bypass the dense enemies to survive and beat the BOSS to win.

The game has 6 levels. The enemies which have different shapes and features, are not easy, so it is a huge challenge to win the game. for winning the game, you need  a keen sense of color, flexible operation, and coordination.

Talk is cheap, show you the game!

操作方式

方向键或WASD控制光标，回车键或空格键确定；

鼠标指针控制方向，滚轮控制频率，鼠标左键射击。

Controls

Arrows or WASD to move the cursor
Enter or Space to select
Control the player with the mouse, mouse wheel changes frequency, and hold the left button to shoot.
